metadata.name: HackTool - PurpleSharp Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of the PurpleSharp adversary simulation tool

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\purplesharp')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('purplesharp.exe') OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('xyz123456.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('purplesharp'))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of the PurpleSharp adversary simulation tool
